name: Crazy Cooking (itch)
description:
It's madness in the kitchen but the food still needs to be made!

Ninjas have taken a disliking to you and now you must dodge their knives and retaliate with food to stand any hope of survival.

 Controls

AD: Move

WS: Adjust camera

Q / E: Previous/Next food

Mouse left button click and drag: Aim

Mouse release: Throw food

Esc: Pause / Unpause

Installation:

  • Download zip file
  • Extract files
  • Run CrazyCookingPrototype.exe file
